Text:
Man, why are they not releasing 720p shows anymore as of late???

No "Lie to me in 720p", now they won't be releasing this in 720p either.  It's like we're moving backward technologically.  What's the point of not releasing it in 720p?
Why wouldn't they encode and release this in 720p? Low res only, it's like we're moving technologically backwards.

Nice to see a new series, mellow but entertaining enough for a chillout session.

Thanks

you must be kidding.

try finding time warp in regular res and not 720p.

dont get me wrong i love 720p but really slow motion is just fine in regular res.

why cant they just do both versions?
Why the heck is this compressed in RAR format?  Just load a simple AVI!  It's only 350MB, SHEESH!!!
